rule.ruleDesc: Send HTML Email: IM.Closure to Incident Coordinator
rule.condition: problem.status in $L.file="Closed" and not (same(problem.status in $L.file, problem.status in $L.file.save))
rule.conditionDesc: ( problem.status in CurrentRecord = "Closed" AND problem.status in CurrentRecord != problem.status in SavedRecord)
rule.conditionXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate="" ><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Status">problem.status</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="">Closed</Value></condition><condition logical="AND" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Status">problem.status</FieldName></operand><Comparison>neq</Comparison><Value type="field"><TableName>SavedRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Status">problem.status</FieldName></Value></condition></collection></XmlCondition>
rule.fullDesc: Send HTML Email: IM.Closure to Incident Coordinator (when ( problem.status in CurrentRecord = "Closed" AND problem.status in CurrentRecord != problem.status in SavedRecord))

rule.ruleDesc: Send HTML Email: IM.Closure to Requester
rule.condition: problem.status in $L.file="Closed" and not (same(problem.status in $L.file, problem.status in $L.file.save))
rule.conditionDesc: ( problem.status in CurrentRecord = "Closed" AND problem.status in CurrentRecord != problem.status in SavedRecord)
rule.conditionXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate="" ><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Status">problem.status</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="">Closed</Value></condition><condition logical="AND" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Status">problem.status</FieldName></operand><Comparison>neq</Comparison><Value type="field"><TableName>SavedRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Status">problem.status</FieldName></Value></condition></collection></XmlCondition>
rule.fullDesc: Send HTML Email: IM.Closure to Requester (when ( problem.status in CurrentRecord = "Closed" AND problem.status in CurrentRecord != problem.status in SavedRecord))

rule.ruleDesc: Send HTML Email: IM.Escalation to Assignee
rule.condition: escalated in $L.file="true" and not (same(escalated in $L.file, escalated in $L.file.save))
rule.conditionDesc: ( escalated in CurrentRecord = "true" AND escalated in CurrentRecord != escalated in SavedRecord)
rule.conditionXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate="" ><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Escalated">escalated</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="">true</Value></condition><condition logical="AND" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Escalated">escalated</FieldName></operand><Comparison>neq</Comparison><Value type="field"><TableName>SavedRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Escalated">escalated</FieldName></Value></condition></collection></XmlCondition>
rule.fullDesc: Send HTML Email: IM.Escalation to Assignee (when ( escalated in CurrentRecord = "true" AND escalated in CurrentRecord != escalated in SavedRecord))

rule.ruleDesc: Send HTML Email: IM.Escalation to Incident Manager
rule.condition: escalated in $L.file="true" and not (same(escalated in $L.file, escalated in $L.file.save))
rule.conditionDesc: ( escalated in CurrentRecord = "true" AND escalated in CurrentRecord != escalated in SavedRecord)
rule.conditionXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate="" ><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Escalated">escalated</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="">true</Value></condition><condition logical="AND" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Escalated">escalated</FieldName></operand><Comparison>neq</Comparison><Value type="field"><TableName>SavedRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Escalated">escalated</FieldName></Value></condition></collection></XmlCondition>
rule.fullDesc: Send HTML Email: IM.Escalation to Incident Manager (when ( escalated in CurrentRecord = "true" AND escalated in CurrentRecord != escalated in SavedRecord))

rule.condition: not (same(assignee.name in $L.file, NULL)) and (not (same(assignee.name in $L.file, assignee.name in $L.file.save)) or same(assignee.name in $L.file.save, NULL))
rule.conditionDesc: ( assignee.name in CurrentRecord != NULL AND ( assignee.name in CurrentRecord != assignee.name in SavedRecord OR assignee.name in SavedRecord = NULL))
rule.conditionXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate="" ><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Assignee">assignee.name</FieldName></operand><Comparison>neq</Comparison><Value dataType="">NULL</Value></condition><collection logical="AND" negate="" ><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Assignee">assignee.name</FieldName></operand><Comparison>neq</Comparison><Value type="field"><TableName>SavedRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Assignee">assignee.name</FieldName></Value></condition><condition logical="OR" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>SavedRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Assignee">assignee.name</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="">NULL</Value></condition></collection></collection></XmlCondition>
rule.fullDesc: Send HTML Email: IM.Assignment (when ( assignee.name in CurrentRecord != NULL AND ( assignee.name in CurrentRecord != assignee.name in SavedRecord OR assignee.name in SavedRecord = NULL)))

rule.condition: same(assignee.name in $L.file, NULL) and not (same(assignment in $L.file, NULL)) and (same(assignment in $L.file.save, NULL) or not (same(assignment in $L.file.save, assignment in $L.file)))
rule.conditionDesc: ( assignee.name in CurrentRecord = NULL AND assignment in CurrentRecord != NULL AND ( assignment in SavedRecord = NULL OR assignment in SavedRecord != assignment in CurrentRecord))
rule.conditionXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate="" ><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Assignee">assignee.name</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="">NULL</Value></condition><condition logical="AND" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Assignment Group">assignment</FieldName></operand><Comparison>neq</Comparison><Value dataType="">NULL</Value></condition><collection logical="AND" negate="" ><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>SavedRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Assignment Group">assignment</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="">NULL</Value></condition><condition logical="OR" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>SavedRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Assignment Group">assignment</FieldName></operand><Comparison>neq</Comparison><Value type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Assignment Group">assignment</FieldName></Value></condition></collection></collection></XmlCondition>
rule.fullDesc: Send HTML Email: IM.Assignment Group (when ( assignee.name in CurrentRecord = NULL AND assignment in CurrentRecord != NULL AND ( assignment in SavedRecord = NULL OR assignment in SavedRecord != assignment in CurrentRecord)))
